utilities

Class GroupOrderCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • utilities.GroupOrderCalculator

  • public class GroupOrderCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of static methods for calculating the orders of certain finite groups, as well as the logarithms of the orders. The following families of groups are covered by this utility:

    (1)The Symmetric Group.
    (2) Linear Groups:
       (i) The General Linear Group over a finite field.
      (ii) The Special Linear Group over a finite field.
     (iii) The Symplectic Similitude Group over a finite field.
     (iv) The Symplectic Group over a finite field.

    (3) Projective Groups:
       (i) The Projective General Linear Group over a finite field.
      (ii) The Projective Special Linear Group over a finite field.
     (iii) The Projective Symplectic Similitude Group over a finite field.
     (iv) The Projective Symplectic Group over a finite field.

    The getOrder methods return a value of 0 if the actual order exceeds Long.MAX_VALUE==2^64-1.

    Author:
    pdokos

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double getLogOrderGLn(int n, int q)
      Returns the logarithm of the order of the General Linear Group on a vector space of dimension n over a finite field of order q (where q is any prime power).

    • Method Detail

      • getOrderGLn

        public static long getOrderGLn(int n,
               int q)
        Returns the order of the General Linear Group on a vector space of dimension n over a finite field of order q (where q is any prime power).

        It is the responsibility of the client to ensure that n is positive, and that q is a prime power.

        Parameters:
        n - any positive int value.
        q - any int value which is a prime power.
        Returns:
        The order of the General Linear Group on a vector space of dimension n over a finite field of (prime power) order q. This method returns a value of 0 if the actual order exceeds Long.MAX_VALUE.

      • getOrderSymmetricGroup

        public static long getOrderSymmetricGroup(int n)
        Returns the order of the Symmetric Group on n letters. This is just the factorial of n.

        It is the responsibility of the client to ensure that n is positive.

        Parameters:
        n - any positive int value.
        Returns:
        The order of the Symmetric Group on n letters. This method returns a value of 0 if the actual order exceeds Long.MAX_VALUE.
